definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pour forth (intrans.), be poured out (NH id., Niph. flow, Hiph. melt (trans.); As natâku, flow Dl:HWB 487 Jäger:BAS ii. 292; Targum Aph. pour out, esp. melt; Zinj. [[ליתכה]] (Haph.) Nö:ZMG xlvii (1893), 98 Cook 83; Syr. nuwi4otn (rare) PS:2480);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּתַּח]] Je 42:18 + 3 t., [[וַתִּתַּח]] Je 44:6, Da 9:11; 3 mpl. [[וַיִּתְּכוּ]] Job 3:34; —pour forth, alw. fig., [[כַמַּיִם שַׁאֲגׁתָָי]] ´[[וַיִתּ]] Job 3:24 and my groans have poured forth like water; usu. of divine wrath ([[חֵמָה]]) Je 42:18 (c. [[עַל־]] pers.), Je 44:6 (abs.), 2Ch 12:7, 2Ch 34:25 (both c. [[בְּ]] loc. against); cf. also Da 9:11 v:Da 9:27 (both c. [[עַל־]] pers.)

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נִתַּח]] Ex 9:33 + 2 t.; 3 fs. [[נִתְּכָה]] Na 1:6, 2Ch 34:21, [[וְנִתְּכָה]] consec. Ez Eze 24:11; 2 mpl. [[וְנִתַּכְתֶּם]] Ez Eze 22:21; Pt. f. [[נִתֶּ֫בֶת]] Je 7:20:—be poured, of rain, [[אָָרְחָה]] Ex 9:33 (J), cf. [[מַיִם עֲלֵיהֶם]] ´[[נ]] 2Sa 21:10; be poured out, of wrath of ´[[י]] Na 1:6 (abs.), Je 7:20 (c. [[אֶל־]] loc.), Je 42:18 (c. [[עַל־]] pers.), 2Ch 34:21 (c. [[בְּ]] pers.); be poured forth i.e. melted, annihilated in the midst of ([[בְּתוֹח]]) the fire of ´[[י]]'s fury Ez Eze 22:21 (subj. persons), so Eze 24:11 (subj. impurity, fig. of caldron).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 mpl. [[הִתִּיכוּ עֲבָדֶי ְאֶת־הַכֶּסֶף]] 2Ki 22:9 thy servants have poured out the money (‖ 2Ch 34:12 infr.); 1 s. [[וְהִתַּכְתִּ֫י אֶתְכֶם]] consec. Ez Eze 22:20 and I will, melt you (fig. of judgment); Inf. cstr. [[לְהַנְתִּיח]] Ez Eze 22:20 in order to melt  it (i.e. metal in furnace ; Co after LXX. SyrVer reads [[לְהִנׇּתֵח]]

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Inf., so Berthol, cf. Toy); Impf. 3 mpl. [[וַיַּתִּיכוּ]] 2Ch 34:17 (‖ 2Ki 22:9 supr.); [[הֲלאׁ]] [[כֶחָלָב תַּתִּיכֵנִי]] Job 10:10 dost (= didst) thou not pour me out like milk? (of beginnings of life).

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 mpl. [[כֵּן תֻּתְּכוּ]] Ez Eze 22:22 so shall ye be melted (fig. of judgement).
